function.name: create_scaffold
function.description: Generate a complete prim package from a prim.yaml spec. Returns file manifest with contents. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_validate
function.description: Validate a prim.yaml spec against the schema without generating files. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_schema
function.description: Return the prim.yaml JSON schema for agents to reference when writing specs. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: create_get_ports
function.description: Return allocated ports and next available port number. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).
